name: Booking a Taxi
description: A real-world situation where a person is trying to get a taxi for travel. The interaction typically involves requesting a ride, confirming the destination, asking about availability, estimated time, and fare, and responding as a taxi driver or booking assistant.

name: Booking a Hotel
description: A scenario where a guest is checking into or booking a hotel room. The interaction includes greeting the guest, asking for booking details, room preferences, ID verification, stay duration, and responding like a hotel receptionist or booking staff.

name: Grocery Shopping
description: A daily-life situation where a customer is shopping in a supermarket. The interaction may involve asking about product availability, prices, offers, sections, or checkout help, responding like a store assistant or cashier.

name: Visiting a Library
description: A quiet and formal scenario where a person visits a library. The interaction may involve asking for book locations, membership details, borrowing rules, study areas, or responding as a librarian or library assistant.

name: Attending a Cooking Class
description: A guided learning scenario where a participant attends a cooking class. The interaction includes following instructions, asking about ingredients or techniques, and responding as a cooking instructor or class coordinator.

name: Exploring a Market
description: A lively real-world scenario where a person is exploring a local market. The interaction may involve bargaining, asking prices, product details, or responding as a vendor or shopkeeper.

name: Visiting a Café
description: A casual social scenario where a customer visits a café. The interaction includes ordering food or drinks, asking about the menu, recommendations, customization, and responding as a café staff or barista.

name: Going to a Park
description: A relaxed outdoor scenario where a person is spending time in a public park. The interaction may involve casual conversation, guidance, safety rules, or responding as a park attendant or companion.

name: Attending a Festival
description: A lively situation where a person is attending a cultural or public festival. The interaction may involve directions, event schedules, food stalls, tickets, or responding as an event organizer or vendor.

name: Visiting a Hair Salon
description: A service-based scenario where a customer visits a hair salon. The interaction includes discussing hairstyles, services, pricing, appointments, and responding like a professional hairstylist or receptionist.

name: Ordering Flowers
description: A situation where a customer is ordering flowers for an occasion. The interaction involves selecting flower types, arrangements, delivery details, and responding as a florist or shop assistant.

name: Ordering a Birthday Cake
description: A customer-service scenario where a person is ordering a birthday cake. The interaction includes discussing flavors, size, customization, delivery date, and responding like a bakery staff member.

name: Visiting an Art Gallery
description: A cultural setting where a person is visiting an art gallery. The interaction may include asking about artworks, artists, entry rules, or responding as a gallery guide or curator.

name: Going on a Hiking Adventure
description: An outdoor adventure scenario where a person is preparing for or participating in a hike. The interaction may include route guidance, safety tips, weather updates, or responding as a guide or companion.

name: Attending a Concert
description: An entertainment scenario where a person is attending a live concert. The interaction may involve ticket checks, seating guidance, rules, or responding as event staff or organizer.

name: Starlit Evening Date
description: A romantic scenario where two people are spending quiet time together under the stars. The interaction focuses on emotional connection, gentle conversation, and responding in a warm, affectionate tone.

name: Romantic Café Encounter
description: A romantic setting where two people share a meaningful moment at a café. The interaction includes soft conversation, emotional expressions, and responses that reflect intimacy and care.

name: Sunset Beach Walk
description: A romantic scenario where a couple walks together along the beach at sunset. The interaction emphasizes calm emotions, companionship, reflection, and affectionate responses.
